name: Mushroom Eater
description:
In a mysterious land, a little creature is really gluttonous of mushrooms.
Its duty is to eat all of them and leave no trace!

This little creature is sluggish and consumes energy to move around, the only thing that gives it some rest is to keep eating.

Explore different levels and don't forget to ...

                                                                EAT THEM ALL!

     

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROWS  Move the character

     

Install Instructions:

- Download the game

- Extract the Zip file

- Run "Mushroom Eater.exe"

- Enjoy!
